item.title: Generators
item.description: To understand generators you must know functions, iterable and yield so let’s understand that first How does function works? When you call function it’s start from the first line until return statement or if there is any unexpected error occurred i.e. exeption Function returns its result once and then its clears all function state to default, means you lost all intermediate variables etc after return. What is iteration, iterable, and iterator?
